text: Digau hai mee dabu, digau Levi, mo hunu daangada labelaa guu noho i lodo be e hoohoo gi Jerusalem. Digau daahili, digau hagaloohi di Hale Daumaha, mo digau hai hegau o di Hale Daumaha guu noho i lodo nia dama waahale hoohoo mai gi Jerusalem, mo digau Israel ala ne dubu i golo guu noho i lodo nia dama waahale i nia gowaa ala nogo noho ai nadau maadua mmaadua.2.70 1 Kronikel 9.2; Nehemiah 11.3
